-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | cassandra database interface
--   
--   A simple abstration over the Cassandra Thrift bindings designed to
--   make working with Cassandra's thrift API easier, without removing the
--   ability to use it directly. A Cassandra monad is presented for
--   mannaging the connection to the Cassandra server, and the calculation
--   of cassandra timestams (in microseconds).
@package hscassandra
@version 0.0.7

module Database.Cassandra.Types
type Port = Int
type Hostname = String
type Username = String
type Password = String
type ClusterName = String
type Keyspace = String
type Partitioner = String
type Snitch = String
type ColumnFamily = String
type ColumnName = ByteString
type ColumnValue = ByteString
type ThriftApiVersion = String
type SchemaId = String
class Ord a => BS a
bs :: BS a => a -> ByteString
instance BS ByteString
instance BS ByteString
instance BS String

module Database.Cassandra.Monad
withCassandra :: CassandraConfig -> Cassandra a -> IO a
data CassandraConfig
CassandraConfig :: (BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle), BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle)) -> String -> ConsistencyLevel -> Hostname -> Port -> Username -> Password -> CassandraConfig
cassandraConnection :: CassandraConfig -> (BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle), BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle))
cassandraKeyspace :: CassandraConfig -> String
cassandraConsistencyLevel :: CassandraConfig -> ConsistencyLevel
cassandraHostname :: CassandraConfig -> Hostname
cassandraPort :: CassandraConfig -> Port
cassandraUsername :: CassandraConfig -> Username
cassandraPassword :: CassandraConfig -> Password
initConfig :: CassandraConfig
getConnection :: Cassandra (BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle), BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle))
getKeyspace :: Cassandra Keyspace
setKeyspace :: Keyspace -> Cassandra ()
getConsistencyLevel :: Cassandra ConsistencyLevel
setConsistencyLevel :: ConsistencyLevel -> Cassandra ()
getTime :: Cassandra Int64
getCassandra :: Cassandra CassandraConfig
type Cassandra a = CassandraT a
type CassandraT a = StateT CassandraConfig IO a
instance Show CassandraConfig

module Database.Cassandra
data Column
Column :: ColumnName -> ColumnValue -> Column
Super :: ColumnName -> [Column] -> Column
(=:) :: (BS column, BS value) => column -> value -> Column
(=|) :: BS supercolumn => supercolumn -> [Column] -> Column
insert :: BS key => ColumnFamily -> key -> [Column] -> Cassandra ()
remove :: BS key => ColumnFamily -> key -> Filter -> Cassandra ()
data Filter
AllColumns :: Filter
ColNames :: [ByteString] -> Filter
SupNames :: ByteString -> [ByteString] -> Filter
ColRange :: ByteString -> ByteString -> Bool -> Int32 -> Filter
rangeStart :: Filter -> ByteString
rangeEnd :: Filter -> ByteString
rangeReverse :: Filter -> Bool
rangeLimit :: Filter -> Int32

-- | for the given key, within the column family, retrieve all columns,
--   unless filtered
get :: BS key => ColumnFamily -> key -> Filter -> Cassandra [Column]
multiget :: BS key => ColumnFamily -> [key] -> Filter -> Cassandra (Map key [Column])

-- | a smarter constructor for building a Range filter
range :: BS column_name => column_name -> column_name -> Bool -> Int32 -> Filter

-- | a smarter constructor for building a Columns filter
columns :: BS column_name => [column_name] -> Filter
withCassandra :: CassandraConfig -> Cassandra a -> IO a
data CassandraConfig
CassandraConfig :: (BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle), BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle)) -> String -> ConsistencyLevel -> Hostname -> Port -> Username -> Password -> CassandraConfig
cassandraConnection :: CassandraConfig -> (BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle), BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle))
cassandraKeyspace :: CassandraConfig -> String
cassandraConsistencyLevel :: CassandraConfig -> ConsistencyLevel
cassandraHostname :: CassandraConfig -> Hostname
cassandraPort :: CassandraConfig -> Port
cassandraUsername :: CassandraConfig -> Username
cassandraPassword :: CassandraConfig -> Password
initConfig :: CassandraConfig
getConnection :: Cassandra (BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle), BinaryProtocol (FramedTransport Handle))
getKeyspace :: Cassandra Keyspace
setKeyspace :: Keyspace -> Cassandra ()
getConsistencyLevel :: Cassandra ConsistencyLevel
setConsistencyLevel :: ConsistencyLevel -> Cassandra ()
getTime :: Cassandra Int64
getCassandra :: Cassandra CassandraConfig
type Cassandra a = CassandraT a
type CassandraT a = StateT CassandraConfig IO a
instance Show Column
